title: The Cultural Connoisseur
trait: I enjoy listening to traditional and complex music genres like Classical, Opera, and Swing/Jazz.

title: The Tech & Thrill Seeker
trait: I am interested in PC software/hardware and cars, and I enjoy watching action movies.

title: The Social Optimist
trait: I am full of life and energy, have lots of friends, and am generally happy with my life.

title: The Anxious Observer
trait: I am afraid of storms (thunder/lightning), rats/mice, and snakes.

title: The Status Strategist
trait: I spend a lot on my appearance and branded clothing, and I make sure to connect with the right people.

title: The Romantic Dreamer
trait: I enjoy watching fantasy/fairy tales, animated cartoons, and romantic movies.

title: The Prudent Planner
trait: I am reliable at work/school, I prioritize my tasks, and I always think ahead.

title: The Counter-Culture Rebel
trait: I enjoy listening to loud, high-energy music like Rock, Punk, and Metal.

title: The Empirical Analyst
trait: I am interested in natural sciences, specifically Biology, Chemistry, and Medicine.
